How can I activate a data bundle?

From the home page, click on 'Buy Data'. Select the bundle category 'Data Bundles'. Select the bundle type under daily, weekly, monthly, 2months, 3months, 6months, yearly. Select the payment method:- Pay with Airtime: select your number to complete the transaction.- Pay with MoMo PSB: click 'Send OTP', input the OTP once received. You will be asked to enter your MoMo pin to complete the transaction. Ensure that the line is registered on MoMo.- Pay with Bank Transfer: You will be given account details to transfer the amount to within 46 minutes. Once you have transferred the amount, click on 'I've sent the money'.- Pay with Card: Input your card details to proceed. An OTP will be sent. Enter the OTP to complete the transaction.- Pay with USSD: Click on the dropdown, select your bank if listed, and click the Dial button.
